translation.zh: 正是如此 你不得不如此

translation.en: See, if you don't betray Chris, you victimize Dominick.
translation.zh:
瞧 如果你不出卖克里斯
你就害了多明尼克

translation.en: Because he becomes an orphan when you go to prison as an accessory...
translation.zh: 因为他会成为孤儿 你作为从犯入狱

translation.en: ...because you got no living parents to take him.
So he ends up state-raised in foster homes, juvenile facilities.
translation.zh:
所以他会被送到寄养家庭
青少年中心

translation.en: Then he steals a car.
Then he winds up in gladiator academies like Chino and Tracy.
translation.zh:
然后他就上《角斗学院》
就像芝诺和崔西那边的一样

translation.en: Fucked for life.
You know what happens, because you've been there.
translation.zh: 你知道会发生什么 因为你是过来人

translation.en: Dominick didn't get a chance yet to choose his life, but Chris did.
translation.zh:
多明尼克还没机会选择他的生活
但克里斯选了

translation.en: If you give up Chris, you get off clean.
translation.zh: 如果供出克里斯 你会没有案底

translation.en: You can do it for your kid, so you can raise him.
translation.zh:
你可以做到的 为你的孩子
这样你能自己抚养他

translation.en: -What else are you selling? -All kinds of shit.
translation.zh:
-你葫芦里还卖什么药？
-专治各种疑难杂症

translation.en: But I don't have to sell this and you know it, because this kind of shit here sells itself.
translation.zh: 但我用不着卖 你知道的 这种药能保命

translation.en: -Okay, Danny, here's an update. -Drucker's on Line 2.
translation.zh:
-好了 丹尼 最新消息
-杜拉克在二线

translation.en: Lieutenant, hold on for a second.
Lieutenant, I have Drucker on the other line.
translation.zh: 警督 杜拉克警司在另一条线上

translation.en: Oh, well, conference him in.
-Go ahead. -Vincent, it's me.
I want an answer. What's it gonna be?
We're set here. She'll make the call.
translation.zh: 我们准备好 她会打电话

translation.en: Okay, that's good. Here's the deal here.
translation.zh: 好 很好 情况是这样

translation.en: Hugh Benny has reformed his wayward life and become a born-again good citizen.
translation.zh:
休本尼已改过自新
成为洗心革面的好市民

translation.en: Apparently, Neil got sold out to us by this cowboy named Waingro.
translation.zh:
看起来 尼尔是被一个
叫文格洛的牛仔卖给我们

translation.en: Waingro used to be a part of Neil's crew...
translation.zh: 文格洛曾是尼尔团伙的一员

translation.en: ...then he went to work for a money launderer named Van Zant.
translation.zh: 后来替一个洗钱的干活 叫凡赞

translation.en: Units are at Van Zant's house as we speak because he got shot dead earlier tonight.
translation.zh:
此时此刻 有同事在凡赞家中
因为他今晚早前被射杀

translation.en: Now, if Neil goes after anybody else, it's gonna be Waingro.
translation.zh:
现在 如果尼尔要追杀别的人
那就是文格洛

translation.en: Waingro just got himself a suite at the airport Marquis...
translation.zh:
文格洛刚住进了
侯爵机场酒店的一间套房

translation.en: ...under the name "Jameson." He's there now.
translation.zh: 化名杰米森 他现在在那里

translation.en: I want you to get that to bail bondsmen, bookies...
translation.zh: 我要你消息告诉县里的

translation.en: ...assignment officers and snitches in County.
translation.zh:
保释担保人 庄家
外派警员以及线人

translation.en: Anyone you can think of who'll put it on the street.
translation.zh: 任何你想得到 能把消息传出去的人

translation.en: Deploy a team at the hotel and personally check their coms every 30 minutes.
translation.zh:
派一组人到酒店
每半小时亲手检查通讯

translation.en: Because maybe Neil will go for him. Okay? How you feeling?
translation.zh:
因为也许尼尔会去找他
好吗？你感觉如何？

translation.en: -Banged up, but I'll live. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-压力山大 不过能挺得住
-好

translation.en: He's here.
Neil is still here.
I can feel it.
But for how long?
Seven, eight hours, max.
What did you do?
-That was you? -It's what I don't do, I don't sell metal.
Would have been okay, you fly out after. Now it's jammed.
translation.zh:
本来挺好的 你晚点飞过去
现在麻烦了

translation.en: -Now we gotta go together. -Those other people were with you?
translation.zh:
-我们要一起走
-那些人和你一起？

translation.en: My friend, Michael...
...he knew the risks. He didn't have to be there.
translation.zh: 他知道所冒的险 本来可以不去的

translation.en: It rains, you get wet.
translation.zh: 常在河边走哪能不湿鞋

translation.en: Get packed and let's go.
Eady. Eady.
Why did you do this to me?
Who are you?
It's gonna be all right. You understand? It'll be all right.
translation.zh: 不会有事的 明白吗？不会有事的

translation.en: It's gonna be all right.
Right.
There's this Camaro at this address, Level D, Slot 18.
translation.zh: 这地址D层18号车位有一辆科迈罗

translation.en: Here's some cash.
When's it over?
Twenty-two hours from now.
-Then we get out of here clean. -When will you let me leave?
translation.zh:
-然后我们安全离开这里
-你何时让我走？

translation.en: Go now. You want out? There's the door.
Will you let me leave later?
It will be different.
Do you understand?
It's ready.
Vincent.
This is my friend Ralph.
You didn't tell me you were....
-Oh, my God. -Where's Lauren?
-She's at Lisa-Beth's. -Look, this has nothing to do with me.
translation.zh:
-她在丽萨贝丝家
-此事和我无关

translation.en: -I didn't know. I'm terribly sorry. -What are you sorry about? Sit down.
translation.zh:
我事先不知道 很抱歉 -你有什么要抱歉？坐下
-你都不生气吗？

translation.en: Don't you even get angry?
translation.zh:
-你有什么要抱歉？坐下
-你都不生气吗？

translation.en: I'm angry, yeah.
translation.zh:
-我生气
-噢 对 我很生气 拉尔夫

translation.en: I'm very angry, Ralph.
translation.zh: 对 我很生气 拉尔夫

translation.en: You know, you can ball my wife if she wants you to.
translation.zh: 你可以干我太太 只要她想让你干

translation.en: You can lounge around here on her sofa.
In her ex-husband's...
...dead-tech, post-modernistic, bullshit house, if you want to...
translation.zh: 死板科技后现代主义的扯淡房子中 若你想的话

translation.en: ...but you do not get to watch my fucking television set!
translation.zh: 但你不能看我他妈的电视机

translation.en: For God's sake.
Put the television set down.
-I never cheated on you, bitch. -Maybe you should have.
translation.zh:
-我不搞婚外情 婊子
-也许你应该

translation.en: -I should have? -In a way, you're a party to this.
Oh, yeah. I made Ralph fuck you because it makes me feel good.
translation.zh: 我要拉尔夫干你 因为这使我开心

translation.en: Our situation is absurd.
-Look, maybe I should-- -Shut up, Ralph. Sit down!
translation.zh:
-我说 我还是…
-住口 拉尔夫！坐下！

translation.en: Why is it that I have to figure things out and explain them to you? What do you do?
translation.zh:
为什么要我处理完事情
还要向你解释？

translation.en: -I say what I mean, and I do what I say. -How admirable.
translation.zh:
我心口如一 而且言出必行 -多么可敬
-没错

translation.en: -You bet. -Except none of it's about us.
translation.zh: 可就是不谈和我们有关的

translation.en: No.
I may be stoned on grass and Prozac...
translation.zh: 我可能是抽大麻或兴奋剂迷糊了

translation.en: ...but you've been walking through our life dead.
translation.zh: 但你像个死人走出我们的生活

translation.en: Now I have to demean myself with Ralph just to get closure with you.

现在我还要自暴自弃
借拉尔夫终断和你的关系

Touches down, holds for you five minutes, then splits.

translation.en: The plane will stand an FAA check. Filed a flight plan, the works.

What?
Said he's going on his own. Went to look for Charlene.

translation.en: -Didn't you bring him here? -Yeah, I brought him here.
What happened?
It's a free country, brother.
Check in with me at 9. Everything's still cool.

translation.en: All right.
I don't even know what I'm doing anymore.

translation.en: I know life is short.
Whatever time you get is luck.
You wanna walk?
You walk right now.
Or on your own....
On your own, you choose to come with me.
All I know is....
All I know is there's no point in me going anywhere anymore...

我只知道 我再到任何地方
都没有意义

translation.en: ...if it's gonna be alone...
...without you.
Eady.
-Yeah. -Yeah, Vincent, I got a live one.
Okay, I'll hold.
Come on, sugar. Show yourself.

translation.en: -Yeah, do it. -Shut up!
Now, just one second at the window...
...and it's all over.
Hey, man.
-Yeah? -You know any place to rent around here?

translation.en: Yeah.
Alberiz's Grocer on Dell Avenue got cards on the wall.

translation.en: Yeah, thanks.
It's not him. It's not Chris.
Unit 2, this is Command.

translation.en: Take him at the street and check him out.
-Sergeant? -Yeah.
This guy's John Peterson. Valid ID.

translation.en: Car's registered to the last name Bukowski, first name Gene.

translation.en: Ran it to DMV. It's clean.

translation.en: -Let him go. -Roger.
Thank you very much. Have a good evening.
It's a no-go, Vince.
Would you like a cup of coffee while we wait, Mrs. Shiherlis?
Yeah, that'd be nice.
-Yeah? -Yeah, what do you got?
Nothing's happening.
-Yeah? -Hello, it's Vincent.
What do you got?
Nothing's going on. Waingro went for ice. That's it.

Neil is gone.
-Flying like a bird. -Come on, Vincent, how do you know?

-像鸟儿般飞走
-文森 你怎么知道？

translation.en: -We still got bait. Maybe some time! -Got, got. What do we got?

-我们仍然有诱饵 也许还有时间
-我们有什么？

translation.en: What do we got?
Bon voyage, motherfucker.
You were good.
I'm going to the hotel.
I'm gonna take a shower.
Gonna sleep for a month.
Over here.
Come on, baby.
Okay, okay.
Shit.
Let me tighten this.
What a fucking waste.
Okay, here.
Assholes shoot themselves all fucking day. Not you, baby. Not you.

王八蛋们他妈的成天射来射去
不是你 亲爱的 不是你

translation.en: I'm supposed to be here with her. But the police--

translation.en: -Help me. I need somebody to help-- -It's okay.
I got you.
I got you, baby.
It'll be all right, honey. I swear. It's okay, baby.

translation.en: -Let's just calm down. -Your mama's here.

translation.en: -Is she on any drugs? -No.
I want you to get a trauma surgeon and a vascular surgeon.

我猜她割断两条动脉
我几乎摸不到她的脉搏

translation.en: Her pressure's down. So is her respiration. You have to intubate her.

translation.en: It's ready.
-When's the last time anybody saw her? -I don't know.

别人最后一次见她是什么时候？
-不知道

translation.en: -Where did you find her? -The bathtub.
Call Respiratory stat. Give her large-bore normal saline. Wide open.

查出血型 输六升 -她好像…
-呼吸专家呢？

-她好像…

她生命体征稳定
外科医生几分钟后跟你们谈

translation.en: -She's okay? -She's doing good.
-She's gonna be okay. -She's gonna be okay.
-She's gonna be okay. It's all right. -My baby.
-It's all right. -Why'd she do this to herself? Why?
Look what she did. Look what she did to herself.

translation.en: It's all right, honey. It's gonna be all right.

translation.en: I'm here. I ain't going anywhere.

translation.en: -You understand? -Yeah.
I ain't going anywhere.
-Yeah? -It's me.
Plane's in the air now. It'll be right on time.

The guy you wanted checked into the Marquis under "Jameson"...

translation.en: ...if you still give a shit, which I figured you wouldn't.

如果你还在乎的话
我想你不会在意了

translation.en: -You figured right. -So, so long, brother.
You take it easy.
You're home free.
Take it easy.
-What is it? -Nothing.
Home free.
-I gotta take care of something. -Is there time?

-我有点事情要处理
-时间够吗？

translation.en: There's time.
I'll be right back. Just leave her running.

translation.en: -Registration. -Yeah, this is Room Service.
A Jameson ordered a BLT. They screwed up his room number. Could you give it to me?

有个杰米森要了三明治
但房号弄错了 是什么？

translation.en: -They're always doing that. -Yeah, I know.
-1735. -Thank you.

translation.en: Please do not panic. Please do not take the elevators.

-请前往最近的楼梯
-文格洛没动静 我留守

translation.en: I'm checking the stairs. If there's smoke, I'm pulling you out.

translation.en: What about her dad? You want me to call him?
He's somewhere in the Sierras.
And she chose you.
She picked your place.
It's not right, what happened to her.

translation.en: No, it's not.
Okay.
Is there any way...
...that it could work out between us?
I wish I could say yes, you know.

translation.en: But in the end....
You know, it's like you said:
All I am, is what I'm going after.

translation.en: I'm not what you want, Justine.

translation.en: Well, go on, if you have to.

-我不走
-我没事 我可应付

translation.en: Just be careful.
Call me here. Let me know you're okay.

translation.en: Okay?
Take the stairs.
Yeah?
Security. There's a fire on 3. We have to evacuate all the floors.

translation.en: I can't leave here.
Why don't we just talk about this a bit, huh, brother?

translation.en: He's here on 17.
Look at me. Look at me.
Look at me.
L.A.P.D. Don't move. Put your hands on your head, now.

translation.en: Switch me to TAC 5.
Casals? JJ?
Drucker, JJ?
Vincent, I'm at the lobby level by the stairwell.

Teams are moving up the other elevators to the 17th floor elevators.

往17楼电梯间

translation.en: All out of commission because of the fire alarm.

Let's go, get out of the way.
Stay out of the way.
Let's go. Go that way. We gotta go, all right? Go, go.

Come on, let's go.

Get back, get back.
